price: Dan (ingatlah) hari (ketika) ditiup sangkakala, maka terkejutlah segala yang di langit dan segala yang di bumi, kecuali siapa yang dikehendaki Allah.  Dan semua mereka datang menghadap-Nya dengan merendahkan diri.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوۡهُ دَٰخِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fafaziʿa man fī al-samāwāti waman fī al-arḍi illā man shāa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dākhirīna
